anip.mediancut
Class ArrayColorCuboid

java.lang.Object
  anip.mediancut.ColorCuboid
      anip.mediancut.ArrayColorCuboid

public class ArrayColorCuboid
extends ColorCuboid

Represents a subspace of an RGB color space. Used in creating an indexed palette by median cut method. This implementations handles colors as a huge 64 megabyte array representing every possible RGB combination. Useful for images that contain thousands or even more colors.

Field Detail

count

private int[] count
Reference to a RGB color space. Index = r * 256 * 256 + g * 256 + b. Value = number of occurrences of the color (in an image).

depth

private int depth
Color sampling accuracy in bits per color component. Also the bit shift of the green component.

rShift

private int rShift
Bit shift of the red component.

shift

private int shift
Bit shift from this.depth to 8.

Constructor Detail

ArrayColorCuboid

ArrayColorCuboid(int[] colorSpace,
                 int depth)
Constructs a new ColorCuboid.

Parameters:
colorSpace - reference to a 256 * 256 * 256 color space.
depth - Color sampling accuracy of RGB space in bits per color component.

ArrayColorCuboid

ArrayColorCuboid(int minR,
                 int minG,
                 int minB,
                 int maxR,
                 int maxG,
                 int maxB,
                 int[] colorSpace,
                 int depth)
Constructs a new ColorCuboid.

Parameters:
minR - smallest value of red contained by the cuboid.
minG - smallest value of green contained by the cuboid.
minB - smallest value of blue contained by the cuboid.
maxR - greatest value of red contained by the cuboid.
maxG - greatest value of green contained by the cuboid.
maxB - greatest value of blue contained by the cuboid.
colorSpace - reference to a 256 * 256 * 256 color space.
depth - Color sampling accuracy of RGB space in bits per color component.
Method Detail

minimize

public void minimize()
Minimizes the size of the cuboid so that the faces of the cuboid touch the outermost color occurrences in the RGB subspace contained by the cuboid.

Specified by:
minimize in class ColorCuboid

getMedian

public int getMedian(int axis)
Returns median of the points along the specified axis.

Specified by:
getMedian in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
axis - 0 if R, 1 if G, 2 if B.
Returns:
median

split

public ArrayColorCuboid split(int axis,
                              int point)
Splits the cuboid at the plane towards the axis and at the specified point at that axis.

Specified by:
split in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
axis - 0 if R, 1 if G, 2 if B.
point - where to split. Its value has to be between min and max points of the cuboid along the correspongind axis.
Returns:
the other half of splitted cuboid.

getColor

public void getColor(short[] palette,
                     int index)
Writes weighted average of colors contained by this cuboid into the specified palette.

Specified by:
getColor in class ColorCuboid
Parameters:
palette - RGB palette. Data in order RGB RGB RGB..
index - Index number of color, 0..255.

public ArrayColorCuboid newInstance()
Creates a new instance. Copies the reference to color occurrences in color space. See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Factory_method_pattern
